item.title: Web Exploitation Documentation
item.author: zzossig@gmail.com (zzossig)
item.description: Awesome Web Hacking This list is for anyone wishing to learn about web application security but do not have a starting point. Books 1 - The first book is a small introduction to the concept of Internet, web pages, What an IP is, what's a proxy and what are web queries? You can find the link below. Web Exploitation - How to become an online spider 2 - SQL Injection Attacks and Defense
